meta.desc: Displays opened windows in vertical panel with productivity perks
meta.desc_long:
Displays opened windows in vertical panel with productivity perks

- left click to open favorites/activate window
- right click to close
- middle click to rename
- drag-and-drop to re-arrange
- Alt-Tab to cycle
- adjust panel width, transparency and icon size in extension settings
